sentences.english: Actually, Paris is the most miserable with reputation damaged.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，最慘的仍是巴黎，剎時名望受損。

sentences.english: It essentibest friend took my luck to meet you for just a moment in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 在有生的剎時能遇到你，竟花光全部運氣。

sentences.english: In a twinkling. the clock on the wingl struck nine.
sentences.chinese: 轉剎時，牆上的鐘敲九點了。

sentences.english: Here person, the matter, as if checks when went far away to me.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的人，事，似乎剎時離我遠去了。

sentences.english: The nitrogen atoms comtraye instantaneously, simultaneously and spontaneously.
sentences.chinese: 氮原子剎時同時自動化合。

sentences.english: The usually noisy class watched silently.
sentences.chinese: 平時喧鬧的課堂剎時靜了下來。

sentences.english: Cha, softly one Zheng, the empire voice source wishes.
sentences.chinese: 剎時，輕輕一怔，朝聲源望去。

sentences.english: When the words "I love you" were said by you for the first time my world blossoms.
sentences.chinese: 第一次聽到對我說“我”，我的世界一剎時鮮綻放。

sentences.english: What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.
sentences.chinese: 剎時的破裂須要幾年的時間去修補。
